abstract.p: Dennis Grannen letter on May 4 article on online book shopping suggests other Web sites

block.p: As a dealer, I appreciated ''Measuring the Value of an Old Friend'' (Online Shopper, May 4), about online book shopping and Alibris. You might want to check out two other sites similar to Bookfinder: Addall .com and BookRadar.com. All three search the same databases but have slightly different formats. You might also want to check out another site set up by a group of independent book dealers from around the country when it goes on line next month. The site isn't open yet, but you can visit the current dealer-oriented information page at 204.246.14.208 /default.asp.
